sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO GIS_ASSETS_CD_F ( GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, GIS_ASSETS_CD, GIS_ASSETS_NM, GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD, GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD, GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC, GIS_ASSETS_LNM, GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB, GIS_ASSETS_AR, GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN, GIS_ASSETS_ACQ_PRI, GIS_ASSETS_STNDRD, GIS_ASSETS_BLDDATE, GIS_ASSETS_BLD_DT, GIS_ASSETS_RM, REG_USR, REGISTDT, UPD_USR, UPDTDT, GIS_ASSETS_BUPJUNGDONG_CD, GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_GROUP_CD, GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD, GIS_ASSETS_SE_CD, GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD, GIS_ASSETS_INVSTMNT_MTHD, GIS_ASSETS_GIS_CD, GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR, DRW_LST_REGIST_YEAR, DRW_LST_SEQ, GIS_ASSETS_VAL_AMT, GIS_ASSETS_VAL_INQIRE_DT, ERP_ASSETS_SE_CD, ERP_ASSETS_NO, ERP_ASSETS_NO_SEQ, ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_REGIST_YN, ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_RSN, GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD ) VALUES ( #gisAssetsPrtAtCode#, (SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD), 0)+1, 2, '0') FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd#), #gisAssetsCd#, #gisAssetsNm#, #gisAssetsMngDeptCd#, #gisAssetsOperDeptCd#, #gisAssetsLocplc#, #gisAssetsLnm#, #gisAssetsLnmSub#, TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#gisAssetsAr#, ',', '')), #gisAssetsUsageYn#, TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#gisAssetsAcqPri#, ',', '')), #gisAssetsStndrd#, #gisAssetsBlddate#, TO_DATE(#gisAssetsBldDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #gisAssetsRm#, #regUsr#, #registdt#, #updUsr#, #updtdt#, #gisAssetsBupjungdongCd#, #gisAssetsQuayGroupCd#, #gisAssetsLocCd#, #gisAssetsSeCd#, #gisAssetsPrprtySeCd#, #gisAssetsInvstmntMthd#, #gisAssetsGisCd#, TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#gisAssetsRealRentAr#, ',', '')), #drwLstRegistYear#, #drwLstSeq#, TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#gisAssetsValAmt#, ',', '')), TO_DATE(#gisAssetsValInqireDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #erpAssetsSeCd#, #erpAssetsNo#, #erpAssetsNoSeq#, #erpAssetsDisuseRegistYn#, #erpAssetsDisuseRsn#, #gisAssetsQuayCd# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE GIS_ASSETS_CD_F SET
ERP_ASSETS_SE_CD=#erpAssetsSeCd#,
ERP_ASSETS_NO=#erpAssetsNo#,
ERP_ASSETS_NO_SEQ=#erpAssetsNoSeq#,
ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_REGIST_YN=#erpAssetsDisuseRegistYn#,
ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_RSN=#erpAssetsDisuseRsn#,
GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD=#gisAssetsPrprtySeCd#,
GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD=#gisAssetsLocCd#,
GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD=#gisAssetsQuayCd#,
GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_GROUP_CD=#gisAssetsQuayGroupCd#,
GIS_ASSETS_NM=#gisAssetsNm#,
GIS_ASSETS_ACQ_PRI=TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#gisAssetsAcqPri#, ',', '')),
GIS_ASSETS_BLDDATE=#gisAssetsBlddate#,
GIS_ASSETS_BLD_DT=TO_DATE(#gisAssetsBldDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),
GIS_ASSETS_STNDRD=#gisAssetsStndrd#,
GIS_ASSETS_SE_CD=#gisAssetsSeCd#,
GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD=#gisAssetsMngDeptCd#,
GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD=#gisAssetsOperDeptCd#,
GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC=#gisAssetsLocplc#,
GIS_ASSETS_BUPJUNGDONG_CD=#gisAssetsBupjungdongCd#,
GIS_ASSETS_LNM_MT=#gisAssetsLnmMt#,
GIS_ASSETS_LNM=#gisAssetsLnm#,
GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB=#gisAssetsLnmSub#,
GIS_ASSETS_AR=TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#gisAssetsAr#, ',', '')),
GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR=TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#gisAssetsRealRentAr#, ',', '')),
GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN=#gisAssetsUsageYn#,
GIS_ASSETS_INVSTMNT_MTHD=#gisAssetsInvstmntMthd#,
GIS_ASSETS_GIS_CD=#gisAssetsGisCd#,
GIS_ASSETS_RM=#gisAssetsRm#,
GIS_ASSETS_VAL_AMT=TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#gisAssetsValAmt#, ',', '')),
GIS_ASSETS_VAL_INQIRE_DT=TO_DATE(#gisAssetsValInqireDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),
DRW_LST_REGIST_YEAR=#drwLstRegistYear#,
DRW_LST_SEQ=#drwLstSeq#,
ERP_ASSETS_CLS=#erpAssetsCls#
UPD_USR=#updUsr#,
UPDTDT=SYSDATE WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD=UPPER(#gisAssetsCd#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD), 0)+1, 2, '0') FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE GIS_ASSETS_PHOTO_F SET GIS_ASSETS_CD=#newGisAssetsCd#, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#newGisAssetsSubCd# WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd#

UPDATE PRT_FCLTY_PHOTO_F SET GIS_ASSETS_CD=#newGisAssetsCd#, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#newGisAssetsSubCd# WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd#

UPDATE GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F SET GIS_ASSETS_CD=#newGisAssetsCd#, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#newGisAssetsSubCd# WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd#

UPDATE LEV_REQEST_PLOT_BY_FEE_F SET GIS_ASSETS_CD=#newGisAssetsCd#, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#newGisAssetsSubCd# WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd#

UPDATE ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F SET GIS_ASSETS_CD=#newGisAssetsCd#, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#newGisAssetsSubCd# WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd#

UPDATE GIS_ASSETS_CD_F SET GIS_ASSETS_CD=#newGisAssetsCd#, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#newGisAssetsSubCd# WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019', GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE_NM, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, GIS_ASSETS_CD, GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD, GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM001', GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD) GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD_NM, GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD, GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM002', GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD_NM, GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD, GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM003', GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD) GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD_NM, GIS_ASSETS_NM, GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC, GIS_ASSETS_BUPJUNGDONG_CD, GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD, GAM_GETDEPTNAME(GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD) GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD_NM, GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD, GAM_GETDEPTNAME(GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD) GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD_NM, GIS_ASSETS_LNM, GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB, GIS_ASSETS_AR, GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN, GIS_ASSETS_ACQ_PRI, GIS_ASSETS_STNDRD, GIS_ASSETS_BLDDATE, TO_CHAR(GIS_ASSETS_BLD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GIS_ASSETS_BLD_DT, GIS_ASSETS_RM, GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_GROUP_CD, GIS_ASSETS_SE_CD, GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM013', GIS_ASSETS_SE_CD) GIS_ASSETS_SE_CD_NM, GIS_ASSETS_INVSTMNT_MTHD, GIS_ASSETS_GIS_CD, GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR, DRW_LST_REGIST_YEAR, DRW_LST_SEQ, GIS_ASSETS_VAL_AMT, TO_CHAR(GIS_ASSETS_VAL_INQIRE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GIS_ASSETS_VAL_INQIRE_DT, ERP_ASSETS_SE_CD, ERP_ASSETS_NO, ERP_ASSETS_NO_SEQ, ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_REGIST_YN, ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_RSN, ERP_ASSETS_CLS, REG_USR, REGISTDT, UPD_USR, UPDTDT FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd#

SELECT #gisAssetsPrprtySeCd# || #gisAssetsLocCd# || #gisAssetsQuayCd# GIS_ASSETS_CD, (SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD), 1)+1,2,'0') FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsPrprtySeCd# || #gisAssetsLocCd# || #gisAssetsQuayCd#) GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD FROM DUAL

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019', GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) PRT_AT_CODE_NM, GIS_ASSETS_CD, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, GIS_ASSETS_NM, GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD, GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM001', GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD) GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_NM, GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD, GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM002', GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LOC_NM, GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD, GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM003', GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD) GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_NM, GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC, GIS_ASSETS_BUPJUNGDONG_CD, GIS_ASSETS_LNM, GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB, GIS_ASSETS_AR, GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR, GIS_ASSETS_ACQ_PRI, GIS_ASSETS_STNDRD, GIS_ASSETS_BLDDATE, GIS_ASSETS_RM, TO_CHAR(GIS_ASSETS_BLD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GIS_ASSETS_BLD_DT, TO_CHAR(GIS_ASSETS_VAL_INQIRE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GIS_ASSETS_VAL_INQIRE_DT, GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD, GAM_GETDEPTNAME(GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD) MNG_DEPT_NM, GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD, GAM_GETDEPTNAME(GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD) OPER_DEPT_NM, GIS_ASSETS_SE_CD, GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM013', GIS_ASSETS_SE_CD) GIS_ASSETS_SE_NM, GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN, ERP_ASSETS_SE_CD, ERP_ASSETS_NO, ERP_ASSETS_NO_SEQ, ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_REGIST_YN, ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_RSN FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE 1=1
GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode#
GIS_ASSETS_CD=UPPER(#gisAssetsCd#)
GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd#
GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #gisAssetsNm# || '%'
GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD=#gisAssetsPrprtySeCd#
GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD=#gisAssetsLocCd#
GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD=#gisAssetsQuayCd#
GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC LIKE '%' || #gisAssetsLocplc# || '%'
GIS_ASSETS_LNM=#gisAssetsLnm#
GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB=#gisAssetsLnmSub#
ERP_ASSETS_SE_CD=#erpAssetsSeCd#
ERP_ASSETS_NO=#erpAssetsNo#
ERP_ASSETS_NO_SEQ=#erpAssetsNoSeq#
ORDER BY GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, GIS_ASSETS_CD, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE 1=1
GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode#
GIS_ASSETS_CD=UPPER(#gisAssetsCd#)
GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd#
GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #gisAssetsNm# || '%'
GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD=#gisAssetsPrprtySeCd#
GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD=#gisAssetsLocCd#
GIS_ASSETS_BUPJUNGDONG_CD=#gisAssetsBupjungdongCd#
GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD=#gisAssetsQuayCd#
GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC LIKE '%' || #gisAssetsLocplc# || '%'
GIS_ASSETS_LNM=#gisAssetsLnm#
GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB=#gisAssetsLnmSub#
ERP_ASSETS_SE_CD=#erpAssetsSeCd#
ERP_ASSETS_NO=#erpAssetsNo#
ERP_ASSETS_NO_SEQ=#erpAssetsNoSeq#

SELECT GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, GIS_ASSETS_CD, GIS_ASSETS_NM, GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC, GIS_ASSETS_BUPJUNGDONG_CD, GIS_ASSETS_LNM, GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB, GIS_ASSETS_AR FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE 1=1
GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC LIKE '%' || #siGuGun# || '%'
GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC LIKE '%' || #eupMyunDong# || '%'
GIS_ASSETS_LNM = #lnm#
GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB = #lnmSub#
